abstract: Film detailing weekend activities on offer in the city of Caulfield, in Melbourne's inner east.
description: Weekend activities in the City of Caulfield. Schools, churches, sporting and social service groups keep the city alive at weekends. Activities include the running of the Caulfield Cup, and quieter games such as tennis and bowls. School children learn road safety at special classes and attend the Youth Centre. For the elderly citizens there are "meals-on-wheels".
